:py:mod:`pyclean.pyclean`
=========================

.. py:module:: pyclean.pyclean


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyclean.pyclean.remove_missing_values
   pyclean.pyclean.remove_duplicates



.. py:function:: remove_missing_values(df, axis=0)

   Remove rows or columns with missing values (NaNs).

   :param df:
   :type df: Input DataFrame.
   :param axis:
   :type axis: Axis along which to drop rows or columns. Default is 0 for rows.
   :param Returns:
   :param df:
   :type df: DataFrame with missing values removed.


.. py:function:: remove_duplicates(df)

   Remove duplicate rows from DataFrame.

   :param df:
   :type df: Input DataFrame.
   :param Returns:
   :param --------:
   :param df:
   :type df: DataFrame with duplicate rows removed.
